mean and standard deviation in the case of data standardization.
3.6 Step 3: Test Models
Test many models using your test harness. I recommend carefully designing experiments to test
a suite of conﬁgurations for standard models and letting them run. Each experiment can record
results to a ﬁle, to allow you to quickly discover the top three to ﬁve most skillful conﬁgurations
